text: If you were concerned about El Cucuy staying sharp for #UFC249 during the coronavirus pandemic... 😳 (via @TonyFergusonXT) https://t.co/fBp7IfIzvy

entity.name: UFC 249: Ferguson and Gaethje set to face off for the interim lightweight title
entity.description: The UFC 249 is set to also see Henry Cejudo defend the bantamweight title against former titleholder Dominick Cruz.
